name: Chemical Choir
description:
Created in the Imangi 2022 Global Game Jam along with Lukas VanTilburg

Stepping into the shoes of an Alchemist you are trying to create the 4 elements here in this prototype using only 4 mundane resources. The resources go through cycles while on your alchemical slab. Create the correct combinations through trial and error to unlock the secrets of Alchemy!

Project may be expanded upon in the future, I've got some ideas for ways to expand upon it but its not at the top of my priority list.
